title: Black Raspberry Chilli Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE BLACK RASPBERRY CHILLI NICOTINE POUCHES Savour the juicy, fruity sweetness of succulent Black Raspberry Chili Nicotine Pouches by Ace A faint hint of spiciness warms the taste with time, creating a pleasing balance of sweet and enticing contrasts. T he result is a harmonious contrast between the sweet, luscious notes of black raspberries and the tantalizing touch of chilli spice. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Fruity flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes 16MG Per Gram | 8MG Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for all environments MORE ABOUT BLACK RASPBERRY CHILI FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The flavour of black raspberry chilli is a delicious combination that opens up with the deep flavour of ripe black raspberries. A faint hint of chilli slowly surface as you savour the luscious, berry-y delight, giving the whole thing a gentle warmth. The end effect is a tasteful contrast between the spicy kick of chilli pepper and the rich, sweet flavours of black raspberries. This flavour profile offers a distinctly gratifying and spicy touch to the berrylicious experience, promising a delightful and fascinating mix. MORE ABOUT ACE NICOTINE POUCHES Ace Nicotine Pouches are well known for having a higher nicotine concentration and pure flavour experiences. These tobacco-free pouches offer a revitalising and refreshing experience with flavours including Green Lemon, Cool Mint, and Licorice Mint. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Regular Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine (mg/pouch): 16MG Nicotine (mg/Gram): 8MG Flavour Name: Black Raspberry Chilli Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
